Var_Text: Respondent serial
How well informed do you feel about the use of animals in scientific research in the UK?
Interested in finding out more about the ongoing work to find alternatives to using animals in research?
Interested in finding out more about the ongoing work to improve the welfare of animals in scientific research?
I can accept the use if animals in research as long as it is for medical research purposes and there is no alternative
There needs to be more work done into alternatives to using animals in scientific research
I can accept the use of animals in scientific research as long as there is no unnecessary suffering to the animals
Animals should not be used in any scientific research because of the importance I place on animal welfare
It does not bother me if animals are used in scientific research
The use of animals for medical research should only be conducted for life
The UK government should ban the use of animals for any form of research
Acceptable to use animals in research to help our understanding of the human body, where there is no alternative
Acceptable to use animals in research to help our understanding of animal health, where there is no alternative
Acceptable to use animals for all types of research where there is no  alternative
Acceptable to use animals in scientific research to test chemicals that could harm people
Acceptable to use animals in scientific research to test chemicals that could harm pets, farm animals or wildlife
Acceptable to use animals in scientific research to test chemicals that could harm plants or the environment

The UK has strict rules on the use of animals in scientific research
The rules in the UK on scientific research involving animals are well enforced
I trust the regulators to uncover any misconduct at animal research facilities
